name: craigslist-scraper
description: Scrape Craigslist roommate listings with AI-powered search

scripts.scrape: npx tsc scraper.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node scraper.js
scripts.chat: npx tsc housing-agent.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node housing-agent.js
scripts.housing-agent: npx tsc agents/housing-agent.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node agents/housing-agent.js
scripts.orchestrator: npx tsc agents/orchestrator-agent.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node agents/orchestrator-agent.js
scripts.multi-agent: npx tsc multi-agent-system.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node multi-agent-system.js
scripts.multi-agent-mcp: npx tsc multi-agent-system-mcp.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node multi-agent-system-mcp.js
scripts.test-mcp: npx tsc test-mcp-system.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node test-mcp-system.js
scripts.mapbox-commute: npx tsc agents/commute-agent-mapbox.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node agents/commute-agent-mapbox.js
